So my team and I have been brainstorming ideas for our robot and one of the ideas that came up needed an intake that can be used for both scoring elements - any suggestions on how this can be done?

Take a good look at what teams did for 2019, especially those that used wheels to grab the center of the hatch panel and then “expanded” the intake to grab the Cargo balls.

A good starting point may be 1684. Although there were many that did this trick (including 254).

I’d take a look at some 2019 robots that used a two-in-one intake for both game pieces.

See 1684, 3476, and 330 for some examples
